**Summary**
• BTC treasury firms are tanking compared to ETFs, proving the “hodl or die” model is bullshit.
• Outperform or die is the new standard—firms can’t just sit on BTC and expect to win.
• ETFs are eating their lunch, and it’s time for treasury models to evolve or get left behind.

Impact — The BTC treasury model is getting its ass kicked by ETFs, forcing a major strategy overhaul to stay relevant.
